title: How to exclude a filetype in a filter to an Eto.Form.OpenFileDialog()
question:
Hi there,


I am trying to implement an OpenFileDialog in Eto C#.

This works fine, but…

It will include 
.3dmbak
 as well, which I’d like to avoid.


How would I solve this?


FileFilter filter = new Eto.Forms.FileFilter();
filter.Name = "3dm";
filter.Extensions = new string[] {".3dm" };



Thanks,

T.
